clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of head pubic crab and body lice

contraindications.disease: The acute oral LD50 for rats is 4 570 to 12 800 mg kg and 2 700 to 5 300 mg kg for rabbits It is low to very low in toxicity when ingested by mammals
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Piperonyl butoxide does not affect the mixed function oxidase system in humans In small trials in human volunteers usual doses of piperonyl butoxide had no effect on humans
